data.actual_result: Both a thumbnail and image are displayed in the embed. Additionally, if the bot/hook included both fields then the image will overwrite both
data.expected_result: The embed should only have a thumbnail or an image displayed
data.short_description: Rich embeds containing either a thumbnail or image will duplicate into the other field
data.steps_to_repro: - Use a bot or webhook to post a rich embed containing a thumbnail OR an image - Observe the embed
